channel.title: ACM Multimedia Asia 2022
channel.description: Recent content on ACM Multimedia Asia 2022

item.title: Call for Tutorials Released
item.description: We released Call for Tutorials. We welcome your tutorial proposals to reinforce the conference program!

item.title: Call for Workshop Proposals Released
item.description: We released Call for Workshop Proposals and updated Important Dates. The new deadline for workshop proposals is now June 30, 2022. We are waiting for your proposals!

item.title: Important dates are available
item.description: Important dates are now available here. Put it on your calendar!

item.title: ACM MM Asia Site Open
item.description: We are excited to announce the launch of ACM Multimedia Asia 2022 website! More information will be added soon.

item.title: Call for Tutorials
item.description: We are soliciting proposals for tutorials to be held in conjunction with the ACM Multimedia Asia 2022. The tutorials should aim to give a comprehensive review of a specific topic related to multimedia. The topic should be of sufficient relevance and importance to attract significant interest from the multimedia community. Typical tutorial audiences consist of graduate students, researchers and practitioners from both academia and industry. We mainly invite proposals for half-day (2-4 hours including breaks) tutorials.

item.title: Call for Workhop Proposals
item.description: Submission -- We are soliciting proposals for workshops to be held in conjunction with the ACM Multimedia Asia 2022 conference. The purpose of the workshop is to provide a comprehensive forum on current and emerging topics that could not be fully explored during the main conference and to encourage in-depth discussions of technical and application issues. Proposal Format Each workshop proposal (maximum 4 pages in PDF format) must include:

item.title: Important Dates
item.description: Submission deadline is at 11:59pm (AoE) of the stated deadline date. Workshop Proposals Submission June 30, 2022 Workshop Proposals Notification July 7, 2022 Regular/Short Papers (Full Track) Submission July 22, 2022 Demo Papers Submission August 19, 2022 Tutorial Proposals Submission August 26, 2022 Regular/Short Papers (Full Track) Notification September 16, 2022 Demo Papers Notification September 23, 2022 Tutorial Proposals Notification September 16, 2022 Workshop Papers Notification September 30, 2022 Last update: June 8, 2022
